messages.subject: For lovers of yari
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Guys, I have just listed a very nice yari on ebay.  It is unique and has a lacquered neck.  Check it out if you like http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?
messages.messageBody:
Hi Guys,

lacquered neck. Check it out if you like"
